criterios_evaluacion.nombre: The student distinguishes the main concepts of Business Analytics and Data and Statistical Methods

niveles.descripcion: The student presented clearly the topic chosen in a conceptual map made with a digital tool.
The student presented in an acceptable way the topic synthesized in a conceptual map, however, the digital tool management is regular.
The student doesn't synthesize the topics in a conceptual map.
The student clearly presented the chosen topic in the presentation prepared with a digital tool.
The student presented a discussion on the description of the data domain, however, some ideas lack clear arguments.
The student does not present description of the data domain.

criterios_evaluacion.nombre: Description of Data training, validation and test

niveles.descripcion: The student presented the Description of Data training, validation and test.
The student presented the description of the training, validation and testing of data, however, some comparisons lack clear arguments.
The student does not present the description of the training validation and data test.

criterios_evaluacion.nombre: The distinction of Machine Learning for computer processing

niveles.descripcion: The student makes the distinction of Machine Learning for computer processing.
The student makes the distinction of machine learning for computer processing, however, some ideas mentioned lack clarity.
The student does not present the distinction of machine learning for computer processing.

criterios_evaluacion.nombre: Pass and obtain accreditation Big Data 101, for the IBM certification

niveles.descripcion: The student enrolls in the course, completes it, also attaches the certificate and badges as evidence of their learning process.
The student enrolls in the course and passes it, but does not attach the certificate and the badges, or does not obtain these certifications, as evidence of their learning process.
The student does not enroll in the course or does not complete it.
